lead_paragraph: Reliever Will Smith tore a knee ligament while taking off his shoe. Star slugger Ryan Braun's surgically-repaired back is still sore.

headline.print_headline: Braun's Back, but Brewers Enter 2016 in Rebuilding Mode
headline.main: Braun's Back, but Brewers Enter 2016 in Rebuilding Mode

snippet: Reliever Will Smith tore a knee ligament while taking off his shoe. Star slugger Ryan Braun's surgically-repaired back is still sore....
